plugins.name: Error List Checker
plugins.description: The Error List Checker provides an intuitive interface for validating attributes within geospatial data layers in QGIS. Users can check for discrepancies in facility names and sector categories, generating an error list for further review.
features: Validation Criteria: Automatically checks facility names against specified keywords.
Error Reporting: Generates a detailed error list with facility geoid and remarks.
User-Friendly Interface: Designed with easy navigation and quick access to features.
plugins.latestUpdate: Initial Release with Error Validation Features
